Overview

About the ITS Suwon Asia-Pacific Forum 2025

  • Title

    ITS Asia-Pacific Forum 2025 in Suwon

  • Theme

    “Hyper-Connected Cities by ITS”

  • Period

    May 12-14, 2025 (Mon-Wed)

  • Venue

    Suwon Convention Center

  • Participation

    Approx. 2,500 from 20 countries, 50 institutions, 130 business booths
